channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Animals predicting the Super Bowl
item.description: A tree kangaroo at the Roger Williams Zoo in Rhode Island picked the Patriots, while Puerto Rican crested toads in Texas and a tarantula at Brookfield...

item.title: WATCH: Big moments as Olympics begin
item.description: Team USA, with more than 200 athletes, is the largest U.S. Olympic team ever, representing 32 states and chasing gold in Milan.

item.title: Setting the scene at the Milano Cortina Winter Olympics
item.description: "CBS Saturday Morning" explores Northern Italy and breaks down the multiple locations of the Milano Cortina Winter Olympics.

item.title: WATCH: White House deletes racist video of the Obamas shared by President Trump
item.description: After bipartisan backlash, the White House has taken down a racist video of the Obamas that was shared by President Trump.

item.title: Trump says he didn't see full racist video, says he won't apologize
item.description: President Trump shared a video that included a racist animation of Barack and Michelle Obama, prompting backlash and the White House to later take it ...

item.title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals
item.description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, we show you items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage...

item.title: Authorities 'aware of new message regarding Nancy Guthrie': Sheriff
item.description: The FBI and the Pima County Sheriff's Department area "aware of a new message regarding Nancy Guthrie," the sheriff's office said Friday.

item.title: Key storylines to pay attention to at Super Bowl LX
item.description: The Seattle Seahawks are set to face off against the New England Patriots on Sunday in Super Bowl LX, and "CBS Saturday Morning" goes inside key story...

item.title: Swiss skier Franjo von Allmen wins first gold medal of Milano Cortina Games
item.description: The second gold medal of the Milano Cortina Games was awarded to Frida Karlsson of Sweden in the women's 10km+10km skiathlon.

item.title: Ways to build and maintain good credit
item.description: "CBS Saturday Morning" dives into ways people can raise and maintain their credit score.

item.title: Sheriff searching for Savannah Guthrie’s missing mom calls lack of video a disappointing setback

item.title: Savannah Guthrie’s demand for mom’s ‘proof of life’ is complicated in this era of AI and deepfakes
Trump’s racist post about Obamas is deleted after backlash despite White House earlier defending it
